Package logic

package logic
The Logic package contains all the files used in the project which are used for CRUD as well as querying the database to extract data used in the panels
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    amendCRUD
    Amend Class used for changing the details and upadting them to the database
    changepassword
    Class used for querying the database to change the users password
    DeleteCRUD
    class deletes entries in database
    homeLogic
    Home logic class contains methods to retrieve data from the database for the home panel and the tables
    InsertIntoDbCRUD
    File used for inserting data into the database tables
    InventoryPanelManager
    Panel manager class which is responsible for switching between the screens
    table
